title: Add a Biodata page and place the professional summary content under it

requirements.text: Create a new public-facing Biodata page route at /biodata and render an English page heading "Biodata".
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /biodata renders a public page without requiring authentication.
The page displays a visible heading with the exact text "Biodata".

requirements.text: On the /biodata page, display the provided content as two sections: (1) "Professional Summary" with the summary paragraph, and (2) "Core Competencies" as a bulleted list with the four competency items.

quotes:
Professional Summary
Accomplished Bharatanatyam Artist with 25 years of dedicated training and performance excellence. A passionate educator with extensive experience conducting classical and contemporary dance classes across India and international locations. Expertise extends to Bollywood, Semi-Classical, and Folk dance, blending traditional discipline with modern creative expression to inspire students of all ages.
Core Competencies
Classical Mastery: Extensive knowledge of Bharatanatyam theory and practice.
Versatile Instruction: Proficiency in Bollywood, Semi-Classical, and Indian Folk traditions.
Global Teaching: Proven track record of managing dance workshops and regular classes both in India and abroad.
Choreography: Expertise in composing original pieces for stage productions and cultural events.

acceptanceCriteria: The page shows a section title "Professional Summary" followed by the provided summary text (English).
The page shows a section title "Core Competencies" followed by four bullet points corresponding to: Classical Mastery, Versatile Instruction, Global Teaching, and Choreography.
No placeholder or gallery-related content appears on the /biodata page.

requirements.text: Add visible navigation entry points to the /biodata page from (a) the main site navigation (desktop and mobile header) and (b) the footer site links, using English link text "Biodata".
acceptanceCriteria: The header desktop navigation includes a link labeled "Biodata" that navigates to /biodata.
The header mobile navigation includes a link labeled "Biodata" that navigates to /biodata and closes the mobile menu on click.
The footer includes a link labeled "Biodata" that navigates to /biodata.

constraints: Frontend paths listed as immutable must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not add any backend changes for this request (this is static, public marketing content).
nonGoals: Do not re-add or reference the removed Gallery route or Gallery navigation.
Do not implement admin/instructor editing of biodata content in this change.
